scripts.install:clean: rm -rf node_modules/ && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm install && npm start
scripts.compile-sass: node-sass src/assets/scss/now-ui-kit.scss src/assets/css/now-ui-kit.css && node-sass src/assets/scss/now-ui-dashboard.scss src/assets/css/now-ui-dashboard.css
scripts.minify-sass: node-sass src/assets/scss/now-ui-kit.scss src/assets/css/now-ui-kit.min.css --output-style compressed && node-sass src/assets/scss/now-ui-dashboard.scss src/assets/css/now-ui-dashboard.min.css --output-style compressed
scripts.map-sass: node-sass src/assets/scss/now-ui-kit.scss src/assets/css/now-ui-kit.css --source-map true && node-sass src/assets/scss/now-ui-dashboard.scss src/assets/css/now-ui-dashboard.css --source-map true
